q: Gary Moore had no timetable for Allen Iverson 's surgery, only that that it was`` soon.''`` People need to know that Allen Iverson is and always has been a fighter,'' Gary Moore said. He's got a battle ahead of him. Gary Moore said Allen Iverson `` totally disputes'' reports out of Turkey that he was set to retire. on slavery NEW YORK- Award-winning historian Eric Foner has received a new honor, the Abraham Lincoln Prize, for his biography about the 16th president's views on slavery. Eric Foner will receive$ 50,000 for The Fiery Trial: Abraham Lincoln and American Slavery. He is best known for`` Reconstruction,'' published in 1988 and winner of the Bancroft Prize.
